text: Zinthu zonse zabwino, tsiku lalero, zaloledwa kuti mukhoza kuzigwiritsa ntchito. Chakudya cha anthu m’Buku ndi chololedwa kwa inu ndiponso chakudya chanu ndi chololedwa kwa iwo. Muloledwa kukwatira akazi okhulupirira ndi akazi angwiro kuchokera ku gulu la anthu a m’Buku pamene muwapatsa mphatso yawo ya ukwati ndi kukhala molemekezeka ndi iwo osachita chiwerewere kapena kuwasandutsa iwo ngati zibwenzi zanu. Ndipo aliyense amene sakhulupirira mwa Mulungu mmodzi, ntchito zake zidzakhala zopanda pake ndipo m’dziko limene lili nkudza, iye adzakhala olephera kwambiri
